metadata.title: USN-6994-1 -- Netty vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Netty did not properly sanitize its input parameters. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a crash. (CVE-2023-34462)  It was discovered that Netty incorrectly handled request cancellation. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Netty to consume resources, leading to a denial of service. (CVE-2023-44487)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6994-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnetty-java - 1:4.1.48-4+deb11u2build0.22.04.1 No subscription required
